title: How does the contemporary world work? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear Sir very insane people want to believe inthe old values of g-d and country ,however because of secular pressure and knowledge people are tempted to go off on their own to explore different vistas of reality which causes great temptation and confusion for the average man I think the situation will eventually stabilize as women become very respected , and finally will allow men to naturally reassert their necessary masculine identity to become good citizens and good fathers and perhaps to become men of g-d again like Rene Descartes the great Catholic philosopher an exponent of G-d with reason
